data.lyric:
[ti:Will You]
[ar:王源]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Will You - 王源
[00:00.81]词：Jin Suk Choi/Siv Marit Egseth/Rabih Mahamoud Jaber/Nermin Harambasic
[00:01.63]曲：Jin Suk Choi/Siv Marit Egseth/Rabih Mahamoud Jaber/Nermin Harambasic
[00:02.45]和声：Soulman
[00:03.27]制作人：Hyun Woo Jeon/Yeon Soo Lee/Ji Eun Yoon
[00:04.09]录音工程师：Nermin Harambasic
[00:04.90]录音室：Westlake Recording Studios
[00:05.72]混音师：Sung Joon Hong at Gaenari
[00:06.54]母带工程师：Seung Kyun Chae at Sonic Korea
[00:07.36]Do you feel alone? Wanna hide away
[00:13.47]All your hopes and dreams, seem miles away
[00:19.41]Don't want the sun to rise and face the day
[00:25.14]Sounds of sobbing fills your room
[00:31.65]Am I fighting for nothing?
[00:37.59]Only chasing a broken dream?
[00:41.75]Let them say say what they want
[00:47.40]Don't give it up prove them all wrong
[00:54.64]I know you can make it through, believe in yourself
[01:00.67]When you feel you can't go on give it one last try
[01:06.94]You'll not be broken forever
[01:09.98]Will you trust me, will you try it
[01:13.54]Will you, will you?
[01:22.52]"Can't go on no more" that's what you said
[01:28.90]Don't you feel so down not even ashamed
[01:34.84]Need a place to cry?
[01:38.30]Lean on me
[01:39.85]Trust yourself just trust your voice within
[01:47.15]Am I fighting for nothing?
[01:53.11]Only chasing a broken dream?
[01:57.26]Let them say, say what they want
[02:02.91]Don't give it up prove them all wrong
[02:10.18]I know you can make it through, believe in yourself
[02:16.28]When you feel you can't go on give it one last try
[02:22.30]You'll not be broken forever
[02:25.53]Will you trust me, will you try it
[02:28.98]Will you, will you?
[02:34.65]Wind will blow and rain will pour down
[02:37.78]Insecurities can't eat you alive
[02:40.73]Remember this no one can judge you
[02:43.67]Soon there be a rainbow showing up
[02:52.45]I know you can make it through, believe in yourself
[02:58.35]When you feel you can't go on give it one last try
[03:04.61]You'll not be broken forever
[03:07.75]Will you trust me, will you try it
[03:11.30]Will you, will you?
data.trans:
[ti:Will You]
[ar:王源]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.81]//
[00:01.63]//
[00:02.45]//
[00:03.26]//
[00:04.08]//
[00:04.90]//
[00:05.71]//
[00:06.53]//
[00:07.36]是否感到孤独 是否想要躲藏
[00:13.47]所有的梦想与希望似乎越来越遥不可及
[00:19.41]不想太阳再升起 不想面对明天 
[00:25.14]抽泣的声音充斥着你的房间
[00:31.65]我是徒劳无功吗
[00:37.59]仅仅是在追逐一个破碎的梦吗
[00:41.75]不管别人说什么 都请你不要放弃
[00:47.40]向所有人证明你的选择是正确的
[00:54.64]我知道你会成功 请相信自己
[01:00.67]当你想要放弃时 请再给自己最后一个机会 
[01:06.94]伤痛必定会痊愈
[01:09.98]相信我 再尝试一次
[01:13.54]你行的！你可以的！
[01:22.52]当你想要放弃时
[01:28.90]不要感到沮丧 更无需感到羞愧
[01:34.84]当你想要哭泣
[01:38.30]我就会在你身边
[01:39.85]请聆听内心的声音 相信自己
[01:47.15]我是徒劳无功吗
[01:53.11]仅仅是在追逐一个破碎的梦吗
[01:57.26]不管别人说什么 都请你不要放弃
[02:02.91]向所有人证明你的选择是正确的
[02:10.18]我知道你会成功 请相信自己
[02:16.28]当你想要放弃时 请再给自己最后一个机会 
[02:22.30]伤痛必定会痊愈
[02:25.53]相信我 再尝试一次
[02:28.98]你行的！你可以的！
[02:34.65]人生无常 风雨不断
[02:37.78]但风雨过后 彩虹依旧
[02:40.73]请记住 我的世界由我主宰
[02:43.67]所有的不安终会烟消云散
[02:52.45]我知道你会成功 请相信自己
[02:58.35]当你想要放弃时 请再给自己最后一个机会 
[03:04.61]伤痛必定会痊愈
[03:07.75]相信我 再尝试一次
[03:11.30]你行的！你可以的！
